Class EasyAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
mastermind.core.solvers.MastermindAlgorithm
mastermind.core.solvers.EasyAlgorithm
public class EasyAlgorithm extends MastermindAlgorithm
EasyAlgorithm is a solver for the Mastermind game. It generates guesses based on previous responses, starting with a simple guess and gradually shuffling correct colors as more feedback is received.

      public Code guess()
      Makes the first guess, which is the color represented by the first value in COLORS repeated for the length of the code.
      Specified by:

    • guess

      public Code guess(javafx.util.Pair<Integer,Integer> response)
      Makes a guess based on the response to the previous guess. The guess will either be an extension of the current guess or a shuffle of correct colors.
      Specified by:
      guess in class MastermindAlgorithm
      Parameters:
      response - the feedback from the last guess (correct, misplaced)
      Returns:
      the new guess as a Code object
